org.opengis.cite.kml2.c1

Class PolygonTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.kml2.CommonFixture
      • org.opengis.cite.kml2.c1.PolygonTests

  • public class PolygonTests
extends CommonFixture
    Implements tests that apply to kml:Polygon elements. The relevant test cases from the abstract test suite are listed below:
    • ATC-103: Valid geometry coordinates
    • ATC-117: Polygon boundary elements
    See Also:
    "OGC 14-068r1: OGC KML 2.3 - Abstract Test Suite, Conformance Level 1"

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.opengis.cite.kml2.CommonFixture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolygonTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void findPolygonElements()
      Finds kml:Polygon elements in the KML document that do not appear in an update context.
      void validAltitudeMode()
      [Test] Verifies that a kml:Polygon element has a valid altitudeMode value as determined by the values of its kml:extrude and kml:tessellate elements.
      void validPolygonBoundary()
      [Test] Verifies that a kml:Polygon element has valid coordinates and is topologically correct.

      • Methods inherited from class org.opengis.cite.kml2.CommonFixture

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolygonTests

        public PolygonTests()

    • Method Detail

      • findPolygonElements

        public void findPolygonElements()
        Finds kml:Polygon elements in the KML document that do not appear in an update context. If none are found, all test methods defined in the class are skipped.

      • validPolygonBoundary

        public void validPolygonBoundary()
        [Test] Verifies that a kml:Polygon element has valid coordinates and is topologically correct. All boundary elements must be a valid LinearRing (see ATC-116). Each interior boundary, if present, must define a "hole" in the Polygon such that it lies within the exterior boundary.

      • validAltitudeMode

        public void validAltitudeMode()
        [Test] Verifies that a kml:Polygon element has a valid altitudeMode value as determined by the values of its kml:extrude and kml:tessellate elements.
